summary: It's summer and Sune Anderssons family is planning a holiday in Greece. Sunes father, Rudolf is sulking because then he won't be able to go on his beloved fishing trip. But after seeing how... See full summary »
cast: Peter Haber|Carina Lidbom|Andreas Hoffer|Gabriel Odenhammar|Nina Almlöf|Lars Väringer|Anna von Rosen|Pär Ericson|Nils Moritz|Robert Gustafsson|Carl Magnus Dellow|Gaby Stenberg|Anne-Li Norberg|Göran Gillinger|Dorman Smith|My Linder|Tina Johnson
title: Sunes sommar
